name: Defect
briefdescription: Represents a problem that needs to be fixed

name: Story
briefdescription: Represents a requirement expressed from the perspective of the user

name: Major
briefdescription: Represents a larger body of work

name: Enhancement
briefdescription: Represents a implemented feature that has to be improved

name: PoC
briefdescription: Represents a draft of a solution for a problem

name: New Feature
briefdescription: Represents a task that has to be implemented

name: Investigation
briefdescription: Represents a task that aims to check the viability of an requirement
